articles.author: Andrea Michelson
articles.title: Tick-borne Powassan virus can cause brain infection: what to know - Insider
articles.description: About one in every 10 cases of severe disease caused by Powassan virus is deadly, and half of those who survive develop long-term health problems.
articles.content:
The blacklegged or deer tick is best known for spreading Lyme disease, but it can transmit various other viruses through its bites.
Powassan virus is rare compared to other tick-borne diseases that … [+3171 chars]
